sentences.sContent: Teachers apparently expect a certain amount of aggressive behaviour from boys.
sentences.sCn: 老师显然料到男孩子多少会有些好勇斗狠的行为。

sentences.sContent: ...because they don't want to be viewed as aggressive or disruptive at work...
...Melanomas are the most aggressive skin cancers...
...an employee at Danny's Cycles in Gramercy also said Citi Bike is a good option for people to ease into biking in a city famed for its traffic jams and aggressive drivers...
...Even problems with crime and aggressive behaviour are reduced when there is contact with the natural world...
...Only an aggressive research and development program might find ways of breaking our dependence on fossil fuels or dealing with it...

synos.tran: 侵略性的；好斗的；有进取心的；有闯劲的

phrases.pCn: 积极成长型；进取型的投资管理

remMethod.val: ag(表加强) ＋ gress(行走) ＋ ive(…的)  → 不断行走， 走到别国 → 侵略的

words.tran: 侵略地；攻击地；有闯劲地

trans.tranCn: 侵略的， 好斗的； 敢做敢为的； 有进取心的
trans.tranOther: behaving in an angry threatening way, as if you want to fight or attack someone
